documents.document:
Srilanka – A Fascinating Country to Tour

Srilanka is a place where abundance of unspoiled beauty of nature, rich historical memorabilia, exotic flora and fauna, pristine beaches and diverse culture makes the travel experience a truly fascinating and remarkable one.

[url=]Travel to Srilanka[/url] where in a compact area one could find eight UNESCO world heritage sites, a prolonged coast line with virgin beaches, fifteen national parks, a large area of botanical gardens, three hundred and fifty waterfalls and two thousand and five hundred water bodies, will be a enriching and remarkable one.

Srilanka is an island country situated in Indian Ocean. Srilanka is a multi-ethnic, multi- religious and multi- cultural nation. The people of Srilanka possess a warm and friendly nature. People of Srilanka are renowned for their hospitality. Even strangers are invited for reception in their houses.

Srilanka is a country of unmatched bio diversity. The spirit of environmental protection is present ingrained in the history of Srilanka, when the first Buddhist Monarch started the practice of declaring forest life as wildlife sanctuaries even before Christ. There are twenty four declared wildlife reserves in Srilanka. Out of which, Sinharaja Forest Reserve is designated as UNESCO world heritage site.
Srilanka has about one thousand and three hundred meters long coastline of which much is pristine beaches. The important beaches of Srilanka are Alankuda beach, Negombo, Beruwala, Bentota, Kosgoda, Unawatuna, Weligama, Tangalle Bay, Arugam Bay, Pasikuda, Kalkuda, Trincomalee and Pigeon Island.

With a long coastline to boot, Srilanka is apt for wind-surfing, water skiing, surfing, sailing, scuba- diving, snorkeling and speed boating. More renowned of water sports sites are Negombo, Wadduwa, Kalutara, Beruwela, Bentota, Hikkaduwa and Galle.

Holiday in Srilanka will be memorable with opportunities to engage in many activities like Whale and Dolphin watching, Deep sea fishing, Diving, white water rafting, ballooning, golfing, swimming, surfing, rock climbing and also hiking and trekking.

Many types of rice, spices, vegetables and fruits are cultivated in Srilanka. This fact in confluence with foreign influences result in a unique and delicious cuisine. Srilanka has a delectable array of snacks also.

Srilanka specializes in providing Ayurveda treatment to tourists. The system originally emanated in India and inculcated wholeheartedly by Srilanka includes various modes of herbal treatments, baths and massages. The spas which are widely seen in Srilanka, apart from Ayurveda, offer many eastern and western therapies.

There are eight sites in Srilanka which are declared world heritage sites by UNESCO. They are Central Highlands, Dutch fort in Galle, Sacred temple of tooth in Kandy, Anuradhapura, Sinharaja forest reseve, Golden temple of Dambulla, Polonnaruwa and Sigirya rock fort and city.

Central highlands is considered a super bio diversity spot and is home to many exotic flora and fauna species. Galle Dutch fort has the distinction of being best preserved sea fort in South Asia. The fort is a superb blend of architecture. The sacred temple of tooth in Kandy holds one of the sacred relics of Buddhism and is a pilgrim centre for all those who follow Buddhist faith. Golden Temple of Dambulla is a pilgrim site for Hindus and Buddhists alike. Sigirya Rock Fort is an astonishing piece of engineering and construction.

There are a numerous waterfalls in Srilanka which are remarkable and fascinating to behold. Some of the prominent of them are Bambarakanda, Duhinda, Diyaluma and Ravana.

Vimlesh Kumar is an eminent analyst and writer in Travel & Tourism related topics. He has authored may books on tour guide Srilanka Trip and Srilanka Tourism. Find more Information to visit at http://www.srilankatourpackages.org/

Explore the Splendor Tourist Attractions of Srilanka

Srilanka is the most beautiful country which is located in the Indian Ocean. This beautiful country is truly one of the amazing countries which will truly elate the visitor’s heart from all over the globe. This beautiful destination is truly one of the most traveled destinations in the entire world. The exotic charm and the splendid beauty of this scenic country will truly amaze you with its beauty and magnetism. This country is dotted with some beautiful attractions and destinations which are very worth to visit and explore. The rich culture, rich heritage and the historical landmarks are very attractive and tempting which attracts all over the visitors.

The wide range of tourist attractions and the destinations which truly enhance the beauty of the Srilanka tourism are listed below:

Kandy
Kandy is the cultural capital city of Srilanka which is also the most sought after tourist destination in the entire country. This beautiful hill town was earlier identified as the royal capital city of Srilanka and is truly very worth to visit and explore with any Tour Packages Srilanka. This is one of the most sacred cities and was listed to the UNESCO World Heritage Sites. Kandy is one of the most important hill cities which are dotted with some fascinating tourist attractions which truly are wonderful to explore and visit. Some of the major tourist attractions to explore in Kandy are listed below:

The Holy Temple of the Tooth
The holy temple of the Tooth in Kandy is truly very worth visit and is also one of the main tourist attractions in this city. This is also one of the most sacred Buddhist temples, where one of the Buddha’s tooth is kept. A golden canopy was added recently and daily rituals are being carried out at various offering times to the shrine. The octagonal pavilion enhances the beauty of this temple.

The Royal Botanical Gardens
This green emerald park is one of the most beautiful parks in this island. This garden is one of the finest in Asia and is one of the major attractions in the Kandy. Lovingly called as the Peradeniya Royal Botanical Gardens is truly very beautiful and astounding, this garden is located at elevation of 500 meter which is endowed by the on three sides by a loop of River Mahaweli (Great Sandy River). This is also the largest River in the Srilanka.

Beside these there are many attractions in this hill city which are very worth to explore in the city, some of them are such as Hindu Shrines, the Old Royal Palace compound, Hill country Rail line, Embekke Temples, Arts and Crafts etc.

Apart from these Srilanka is has many other attractions and destinations which are very worth to explore. Colombo is the major tourist destinations which is the most traveled by the visitors in Srilanka. This city is the capital city of Srilanka and is showcase for the amazing culture and the rich heritage. Honestly speaking visit this country and do not miss the opportunity to add Clombo Tours Packages with any packages to Srilanka.

Vimlesh Kumar is an eminent analyst and writer in Travel & Tourism related topics. He has authored may books on tour guide Srilanka Trip and Srilanka Travel . For more information visit to http://www.srilankatourpackages.org.

Excellent Tourist Attractions to visit and explore on Srilan

Srilanka is one of the most beautiful tourist destinations in the entire South Asia and is truly very worth to visit and explore. This beautiful destination beautifully floats on the Indian Ocean and is lovingly called as ‘Jewel Crown of Indian Ocean’. Beautiful Srilanka is dotted with wide range of tourist attractions such as shimmering beaches, splendid temples, ancient monuments, elegant forts, lush green emerald gardens and many alike easily lures the visitors and tempt them to visit this country again and again. Srilanka is truly a dream come true destination for the visitor from all over the globe. This beautiful country is endowed with rich and diverse flora and fauna. This country is dotted with numerous national parks, and wildlife sanctuaries well preserved.

Srilanka has its own unique performing art and traditions which truly leave the foreign visitors spell bound on their visit to Kerala. Truly the rich culture of the country is the portrait of Traditional heritage. Experiencing its rich culture is truly a lifetime opportunity, thus participating and exploring the Srilanka festival is the best way to explore its rich culture, traditions, life and it's people with smiling faces truly wins all the visitors heart.

Holiday in Srilanka is also very renowned for its Ayurvedic spas and treatment as intense number of tourist and visitors come to this country for Ayurvedic therapy. This astounding country also offer the visitors adventurous sports like trekking, rock climbing, Mountain biking, para gliding, canoeing, kayaking etc these truly enhance the importance of tourism in Srilanka.

Some of the major cities and its attractions to explore in this beautiful country are such as:

Kandy
This is truly a paradise for the visitors and truly very captivating to all the heart of visitors. Kandy is a picturesque hill town which is very renowned among the visitors from all over the globe. This beautiful destination is located at elevation of 500 meter above the main sea level, blessed by the natural wonders and the soothing amiable climatic conditions offers the visitors a wonderful vacation. Some of the major tourist attractions and destinations which are very worth to visit and explore are such as The Temple of Tooth, Peradeniya Gardens, Lankatilaka Temple, Knuckle Mountains and Hindu Shrines. Beside these there are numerous more attractions and destinations which easily leave the visitors spell bound on their visit to Kandy the UNESCO World Heritage Site. This beautiful hill station is also identified as the cultural capital Srilanka and is located just 110 km away from the capital city Colombo.

Colombo
Colombo is the capital city of Srilanka and is truly very worth to visit and explore. Clombo Tours Packages truly will entice you and offer the rich culture and traditions which are immersed with the modern amenities and convenience. The bustling nightlife, excellent standard hotels, incredible shopping facilities and the elegant historical forts truly are sheer wonders which will overcast magical spurt on your visit to Srilanka and exploring the capital city of Colombo.

Beside these there are numerous attractions and destinations which are worth to visit and explore on your package to Srilanka.

The Most Prominent Destinations to Explore On Your Honeymoon

Honeymoon in India is truly a dream for all the newlywed couples. This beautiful destination is located in the south Asia and is truly the most fascinating destination which entices all the sort of vacationers. This beautiful destination is truly the most wonderful and heart grabbing destination which easily attract the vacationers from all over the globe. The honeymooners from all over the globe easily entice by the beautiful mountains, stunning beaches, enchanting lakes, picturesque hill stations, magnificent cities, rustic charm and wonderful modern convenience all over easily tempt the married couples and other vacationers in intense number throughout the year.

Some of the major tourist attractions and destinations which truly make the northern India the most wonderful site in India to explore on your romantic honeymoon. The entire north of India easily will leave the vacationers spell bound as truly they are very beautiful and wonderful and worth to explore. Some of the major Honeymoon Destinations in India which offer peaceful and serene ambiance where love and romance flows abundantly are such as listed below:

Jammu Kashmir
Jammu and Kashmir lovingly identified as heaven on earth truly a splendid place to enjoy your honeymoon. This beautiful state is amazingly nestled within the Himalayans and truly is the most sought after tourist destination in the entire country. Land of elegant temples, green rolling hills, snow capped mountains, enchanting lakes truly this place is bliss for the honeymooners. Some of the major tourist attractions and destinations to explore in this wonderful state are such as Srinagar, Dal Lake, Houseboats, Vaishnoo Devi Temple, katra, Pahalgam and Gulmarg are some of the sheer wonders which will easily leave the newlywed couples spell bound as on with any honeymoon tours India.

Shimla
Shimla is the capital city of Himachal Pradesh and truly is a wonderful hill resorts which is not to be missed as on your Honeymoon in India. Shimla is lovingly identified as Queen of hills, which offers the couples to mesmerize them into the journey of love and romance. Shimla at the elevation of 2025 meters above the main sea level is truly nestled in the foothills of gorgeous Himalayans truly is speckled with amazing beauty and exotic charm which easily entice the newlywed couples from all over the entire world. Truly the cool misty climate, snow capped mountains, chatty waterfalls, lush green gardens, dazzling green hills and the colonial resorts and hotels is truly a best where the couples can enjoy memorable and delightful moment of your life.

Manali
Manali is another destination situated in beautiful Himachal Pradesh. This iconic destination truly will amaze the honeymooners as on their [url=]honeymoon packages in India[/url] customized from any leading India honeymoon planner. This beautiful hill resort which is located on the National highway which leads to Leh is truly breathtakingly beautiful which cannot be explained in any words. The breathtakingly beautiful destination easily tempts all the honeymooners to visit this beautiful hill town again and again.

Beside these there are number of tourist destinations which truly are very worth to visit and explore in northern India and entire India. Truly honeymoon in India will offer the couples a dream start to their married life.

Top Three Astounding Destination to Visit in Srilanka

Srilanka is the most beautiful tourist destination which is located on the Indian Ocean. This beautiful country is located just below incredible India and truly is the most spectacular tourist destination to visit and explore. Lovingly this beautiful country is called as ‘Jewel of Indian Ocean’ which truly is the most sought after tourist destination. This wonderful destination lovingly known as by the name of Ceylon, which lovingly is a wonderful destination in South Asia, which is speckled with sun kissed beaches, scenic natural spots, gorgeous waterfalls, renowned museums art and galleries along with religious awe inspiring religious sites easily attract the vacationers from all over the globe.

The rich colorful culture, unique traditions, outstanding cultural event and shows, historical land marks and fascinating lifestyle easily attract the vacationers from all over the globe. This astounding destination in Asia truly offers everything to all the vacationers. Srilanka truly is such a destination which invites vacationers throughout the year and of all the ages. From incredible shopping the secluded beach destinations, from the lush green gardens to the national wildlife parks, from the swift flowing rivers to the wonderful astounding hill stations and numerous alike truly make this country a paradise for the vacationers.

Some of the major tourist destinations and attractions which easily enhance the beauty of Srilanka Tourism and which elate all the sorts of vacationers for their delightful vacation are such as listed below:

Kandy
Kandy is a picturesque hill town which is located at elevation of 500 meter above the main sea level which easily attracts the vacationers from all over the globe. This hill town is truly the most sought after destination in Srilanka. This beautiful hill town is the most romantic hill town which is also declared as world heritage city. This wonderful hill town is also called as the cultural capital city. Some of the most beautiful tourist attractions and destinations which easily attracts on your visit to this hill city are such as Royal Botanical gardens at Peradeniya, Sacred Tooth Relic of Lord Buddha, cascading waterfalls, enchanting lakes which easily attract the vacationers from all over the globe. This picturesque hill town is very worth to visit with any Srilanka Tour Package.

Colombo
Colombo is the capital city and economic hub of Srilanka is a wonderful picturesque vibrant city. This wonderful destination is truly the most beautiful and the largest city with a main port as well. This city is dotted with elegant historical monuments which easily are very worth to visit and explore. Some of the major tourist attractions to visit and explore are such as Janadhipahi Mandiraya, Gangaramaya Temple, Beira Lake, Kelani Raja Maha Viharaya, Old Kathiresan temples, Grand Mosque in Pettah and National

Dambulla
Dambulla is the most wonderful tourist destination in Srilanka; the city is globally renowned for its largest and best preserved complex of Srilanka. Apart from these the Iron wood forests, largest rose quartz mountain range in South Asia and the presence of indigenous civilizations truly make this city the most wonderful and worth to visit with on your travel to Srilanka.

Well apart from these there are numerous tourist attractions and destinations which truly elate the vacationer’s heart and soul, tempting them to visit this country again and again.

Top Tourist places to Visit in Srilanka

Srilanka is one of the major tourist destinations in entire Asia which is lovingly called as tropical paradise. This wonderful country is truly the most stunning country which invites vacationers from all over the globe for their wonderful vacation. This country is situated just below Indian subcontinent on the Indian Ocean and it looks like a tiny tear drop shed of India. Srilanka is not a vast country thus all its wonderful attractions and destinations all are located close to each other and truly this entices the vacationers from all over the globe. The rich culture, unique heritage, wonderful art and crafts and the ancient and modern architectural arts and culture easily attracts the vacationers and tempt them to visit this country again and again.
Picturesque Srilanka Hill Stations, exotic wildlife, magnificent cities and towns, rustic villages, ancient cities, awe-inspiring lakes and numerous alike truly make this country an ideal holiday destination. The fascinating beaches, wonderful beach resorts, fascinating restaurants and numerous spa centers truly boost the beauty and attract numerous vacationers throughout the year. The standard, luxury cheap hotels and resorts are speckled all over the country for the vacationers as it provides luxury and comfortable vacation offer a unique experience.
Some of the major attractions and destinations which are much visit and explore one your Srilanka Travel Agents are such as follows:
Colombo
Colombo is the capital city of the Srilanka country and is the largest city in the entire Srilanka. This beautiful city easily attracts tourists as it is dotted with wonderful attractions and destinations which are sheer wonders and which will overcast a magical spell on your visit to this country. This is the largest city and is also the major financial hub of the country. The bustling metropolises and the superb blend of ancient and the ancient and modern culture of the entire country can be explored here. The exotic malls and the superb shopping facilities in the country easily leave the vacationers spell bound on their visit to this wonderful city of Colombo. Stunning beaches, exotic hotels and resorts, excellent forts, open bazaars easily attracts the vacationers for their fascinating vacations.
Wildlife in Srilanka
Srilanka Wildlife offers for wildlife lovers, exotic wildlife sanctuaries which is famous all over the world. There are several people visit to see wild animals which they never seen before. There you can find array of animals like leopards, elephants, sloth beers, wild boars, monkeys, wild buffalos, barking deer, spotted deer, water buffalos and other animals. This spot is ideal for photography. there are some famous wildlife sanctuaries includes Yala National Park, GalOya National Park, Uda Walawe National Park, Horton Plains National Park, Wasgamuwa National Park and Minneriya National Park. Truly the nature lovers and the wildlife lovers never miss the opportunity to visit and explore these major stop overs and enjoy heir thrilling vacation.
Apart from these there are numerous more destinations and attractions which easily attracts the vacationers and which are very worth to explore on with any Tourism Packages to Srilanka customized from a leading tour operator.

Make Your Honeymoon Remarkable With Luxury Honeymoon Package

Honeymoon plays a predominant role in any couples life and it’s not less than a grand celebration for them as it is the occasion of love, romance and intimacy. There are so many destinations world-wide but none is beautiful and affordable as like India a south-Asian country and the most sought after tourist destination. There are so many reasons behind why any one should choose India as their holidaying or honeymoon destination and the first thing is its great diversity, diversity in culture, religion, weather or in every thing. But after a great diversity one can find there a strong unity and bonding among people that makes India incredible. Well this amazing country is full of attractions, enjoyment and colourful festivals and there is no dearth of attractions and enjoyment in this country.

A trip to this county can be classified into different categories as there are so many attractions having their distinctive features. If you wish to explore its rich heritage and culture then you can go for golden triangle tour that takes tourists to the beautiful cities like Jaipur, Delhi and Agra. Jaipur is the capital city of one of the largest state Rajasthan famous with its magnificent forts and monuments. Delhi is the capital city of India and it really does need any introduction as it is the major centre of international vacationers. From great shopping to excellent hotels, it offers every thing to the visitors. Well if you wish to explore greatest feat by man then must visit to Agra and explore Taj Mahal one of the most precious gift by man dedicated to his beloved wife.

Considering your special occasion of honeymoon we have strived to design Honeymoon Packages in such way which brings top sought attractions to the visitors and give them a remarkable holidaying experience. Apart from innumerable attractions, there are many other things that bring this place a global recognition such as its exotic resorts, excellent hotels, hospitable people and its unique culture.

Well if you wish to spend your vacations away from hustle and bustle of life and looking for refreshing hill stations then must visit to Manali fondly called ‘Queen of Hills’, a finest hill station in the state of Himachal Pradesh. Picturesque landscapes, snow-laden peaks, mesmerizing waterfalls, lush green meadows, apple laden orchards and ranges of floras and faunas make Manali a finest place in the planet. Due to the availability of several trekking trails and all time soothing climatic conditions, it is also considered an ideal for several adventure activities like trekking, mountaineering, white-water rafting, snow-skiing and many more.

Luxury Honeymoon Packages in India offer innumerable breathtaking attractions and amazing destinations and promises a great holidaying experience. Well if you are looking for tropical paradise then must head to ‘God’s Own Country’ Kerala considered an ideal place for honeymoon located at southern part of India. Picturesque landscapes, palm-fringed beaches, refreshing hills, wildlife national parks and ranges of floras and faunas make Kerala a finest place in the planet.

Explore tiny emerald island Srilanka and find its magnetic a

The world is no doubt beautiful creation by God, there are so many places worldwide having their distinctive identity and value. People who love to travel always have objective to cover most sought attraction places that’s why they yearly plan for tour where they visit with their family and lovable one’s. When someone plans for overseas vacations then most of the European countries blinks in their mind first, but apart from there are many other attractions in this world which need to be explored and Sri Lanka is among them.

An island country in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is the most sought after tourist’s destination globally popular for its inviting tourism, picturesque landscapes, rich culture and tradition, and many more. Home to the tropical greenery and alluring sightseeing spots, it’s a place like no other destination in the world. Every year from across the world, people visit this country in the great numbers. Whatever you are looking for on your vacations it perfectly knows how to make it possible in this tiny emerald island.

In terms of natural attractions it really doesn’t have any comparison. Refreshing hills, singing waterfalls, exotic wildlife national parks, lush green meadows and ranges of floras and faunas make this country truly paradise for visitors. Apart from its natural attractions there are so many things which bring this country into limelight and enhance the popularity of Sri Lanka tourism such as its well cultured people, warm hospitality, incredible culture, exotic food and excellent hotels facilities. There are so many things to do and explore in this country, it often confuse the visitors what should they do first. Its significance and splendor is just beyond the words and visual descriptions.

Due to the long coast line Sri Lanka is gifted with innumerable amazing beach destinations fills tourist’s heart with fun and ecstasy. Away from hustle bustle of city life it is good to spend some beautiful moments in the perfect setting of sun, sea and sand. The thousands mile ever ending coast of golden beaches offers wonderful opportunity to beach lovers, leisure vacationers, and tourists. Apart from exploring the beaches, one can indulge in several beach and sports activities like swimming, surfing, snorkeling, angling, kayaking, water-scooting, fishing and many more. Some of the beaches that considered ideal to unwind and relax are Hikkaduwa, Trincomalee, Bentota, Weligama, M.t Lavina and many others.

Apart from its beaches there are so many things that can be experienced through Srilanka Tourism Packages such as thrilling wildlife safari encourages tourists to visit there in great numbers. Due to long dense forests and amazing topography, it is considered an ideal place for ranges of species of birds and animals. While on Sri Lanka wildlife tour tourists will have an opportunity to explore ranges of species of birds and animals. Yala National Park, Wilpattu National Park, Maduru Oya National Park, Uda Walawe National Park, Gal Oye National Park are the few and finest wildlife reserves in Sri Lanka.

There are many other attractions and sightseeing that can be explored during visiting Srilanka including the capital city Colombo, the cultural city Kandy and many more. If you have decided to visit this country and looking for affordable holiday packages then contact with Srilanka Tour Operator.

Vimlesh Kumar is an eminent analyst and writer in Travel & Tourism related topics. He has authored may books on tour guide Srilanka Beaches and Srilanka Tourist Places. find more Information to visit at http://www.srilankatourism.org.in

Top Honeymoon Destinations to Enjoy Your Special Vacations

Honeymoon is a lifetime experience and so all the newlywed couples love to make it memorable, enjoyable and everlasting. They look for a place where they can enjoy every moment, share the moments of love, likes and dislikes and more of all plan for the days to come to make it enjoyable and happier. More of all the vacation is much more special as it is the starting of the new married life where they want to start with unique and memorable way. So if you are also planning for the same and want to start the honeymoon holidays in a delightful and memorable way, plan your vacation choosing one of the special vacation planning the holidays together.
India has so many interesting and charming destinations and all having its unique charm and beauty. It is a lifetime experience and spending some time away from home in the cozy and romantic environment, couples will surely get enough time to make the day, fascinating and memorable. From the cozy inviting beaches to the cool refreshing hill stations or from the picturesque Himalayas or to the rough terrains of Rajasthan, India has so many romantic places where newlywed couples can start their newly married life with full of fun, joy and happiness.
There are so many interesting places to visit in India and among those many some of the top romantic places preferred by most of the honeymoon couples for their special vacations are highlighted as below:
Kerala
Endowed in the heavenly natural beauty, rich culture and traditions, heavenly atmosphere and enticing attractions, the state of Kerala has come out to be the most sought after honeymoon destination in India. It has so many exciting and charming attractions and sightseeing spots that make the state truly remarkable and fascinating. Some of the places of tourist interest couples love to visit and explore are the cool and charming hill of Munnar, bewitching backwaters of Kumarakom, Kuttanad, Kasargod and Alleppey and wildlife sanctuary of Periyar. These are some of the inviting tourist places; couples can happily visit to Kerala and enjoy ultimate honeymoon vacation with immense pleasure and delights.
So if you want to enjoy honeymoon in this beautiful Kerala, choose from the many honeymoon packages in Kerala according to your choice and spend the ultimate vacation of lifetime with immense pleasure and delights.
Kolkata Honeymoon
Kolkata has variety of tourist places and going for a honeymoon in Kolkata is truly a lifetime experience. The architectural wonderments well organised parks and the bustling markets and if you love the beach honeymoon, you can travel to Digha beach, Fraserganj and Shankarpur beach close to Kolkata. The cool and refreshing ambiance, palm fringed pristine beaches charmed by the pleasant location, truly make Kolkata beach honeymoon an experience of lifetime. So choose from the many exciting Honeymoon Packages from Kolkata and enjoy ultimate vacation being together in this wealthy and historical Kolkata.

Beside these there are many interesting places to visit in India for honeymoon. So choose from the many Honeymoon Packages and enjoy the moments of lifetime with rewarding experiences.

Remarkable Landmarked Island Of Srilanka on the Indian Ocean

Sri Lanka is a country located in the off southern coast of the Indian subcontinent in South Asia. It is a beautiful island surrounded by the Indian Ocean, the Gulf of Manner, Palk Strait and lies in the vicinity of India and the Maldives. This picturesque country which is well known as the lonely planet has become an international holiday hub popular worldwide.
Sri Lanka truly speaking is a home of diverse arrays of attractions such as beaches, religious temples and historical wonders. The country offer numerous options to undertake like the nature safari, water sport activities and the urban areas provides all the modern amenities and world’s excellent shopping complexes, nightclubs and pubs in addition to many excitements and entertainments available in it. The place has a plenty of delights and heart warming keys that will always give satisfaction to the heart content.
Colombo
This site is also quite popular among the tourist providing several entertaining sports and adventure attractions such as Dutch Period Museum, Dehiwala Zoo, Fort Clock Tower, Gangaramaya Temple and Mt Lavinia beach are some of the attention grasping prominent attractions found in it. Colombo is a former capital of Sri Lanka and is the biggest city and the main financial hub of the country.
Ancient cities of Sri Lanka
If you take a walk on the streets of some of the popular cities and towns of Sri Lanka, you will find most of them are the treasure house of numerous historical relics of great ancient glory. The city like Anuradhapura is the capital city of the country which is a symbol of supremacy with numerous historical buildings like Kelaniya Raja Maha Vihara, National Museum and Wolvendaal Church can be cited as some of its magnificent buildings of this city. You can take the help of Srilanka Travel Agents for other mind blowing historical places which hidden in many corners of the country.
Beaches in Sri Lanka
With the abundant of lovely beaches and its water sport attractions Sri Lanka tourism has swiftly raise to the world tourist fascinating world. This country is one of the best sites for beach hang out and holiday spending with the marine excitement. Among the most notable beaches of the country lies Hikkaduwa beach, Unawatuna beach, Mount Lavinia, Bentota beach and Ambalangoda beach are some of the most frequented tourist wanted beaches of this particular tourist destination.

Srilanka Tea Gardens are also some of the top listed amazing attractions of this lonely planet of Sri Lanka. The places such as Nuwara Eliya in Central Province cover a major area of tea garden which is noted to be a spark of the country. This popular site of Nuwara Eliya is well known to be the capital of tea industry and should not be missed out for experience it in tours. A walk in this thick garden of charming tea plants is an unforgettable experience that will treasure memories of Sri Lanka for lifetime memory.
Collect memories of treasure by exploring the attractions possible offered by the tourism of it and enjoy life time to time with such memories.

Srilanka – Land Of Breathtaking Landscapes And Pristine Be

Srilanka can be compared to multi brand retail shop of a very small size but of immense choice. Within such a compact location Srilanka offers diverse attractions like breathtaking landscapes, virgin beaches, charismatic cultural heritage and various exotic experiences including adventure opportunities, diverse flora and fauna etc. Within a meager area of sixty five thousand six hundred and ten kilometers lie eight UNESCO World Heritage sites, about one thousand and three hundred kilometers of coastline of which there are many pristine beaches, fifteen national parks exhibiting plentiful of wildlife, an enormous amount of lush tea estates, two hundred and fifty acres of botanical gardens, three hundred and fifty waterfalls and twenty five thousand water bodies. Add to that a culture that extends back to over two thousand and five hundred years. Srilanka is really a jackpot of gems.

Srilanka tour packages are for those who love nature, cultural heritage and exotic locations.
Travel to SriLanka offers visits to number of cities that are significant from tourism point of view. Each city is unique in its own sense and caters to tourists of multifaceted interests. Some are noted for their historical moorings, some for their cultural significance, some for their architectural splendor and some for their natural attractions. The notable of Srilankan cities are Anuradhapura, Colombo, Dambulla, Galle , Kandy and Sigriya.

Anuradhapura is an ancient city located in northern Srilanka. It was established in fourth century BC. This city is of interest to archaeologists with several monuments of historical importance. Anuradhapura is also a sacred city to Buddhists with several Dagobas . A daboga is a dome enshrining sacred relics or the bodily remains of the Buddha or articles used by him. Some of the important dagobas are Thuparma dagoba, Ruvanveli dagoba, Jetavana dagoba and Abhayagiri dagoba. Another attraction is Sri Maha Bodhi Tree. The right branch of the Bodhi tree under which Buddha attained enlightenment was brought to Srilanka from Gaya in India in third century BC by princess Sanghamitta, daughter of emperor Asokha. This was planted in Anuradhapura and is venerated by Buddhists. Another attraction is Samadhi Buddha which is a world famous statue of Buddha in meditative pose from fourth century AD. It is acknowledged as a masterpiece. Isurumuniya is a picturesque rock temple built in third century BC. It homes beautiful stone sculptures.

Colombo which is the capital of Srilanka is the largest city and main port of the country. It is also the commercial and financial center of Srilanka. A bustling city with the verve and vivaciousness of modernity, Colombo still keeps the lazy charm of bygone era. The Fort is one of the important landmarks of Colombo. It was originally a fort during the Portuguese and Dutch periods but now is a major commercial center of the country. Many places of tourist interest can be visited in the fort by foot. Adjacent to fort is Pettah. You can do all your shopping in this bazaar district. Galle Face Green is a promenade facing the sea which was actually built by British. Built originally for horse racing, it is now the largest open space in Colombo and a popular picnic spot. Mount Lavinia is one of the beaches that form the important attractions of Srilanka Tourism. Just twelve kilometers away from Colombo, this beach was even famous during colonial era.

Srilanka – A land of diverse attractions

Srilanka is a land of diverse attractions, truly mind blowing. It is a true wonder in that in such a compact location, there are variety of assortments encompassing geographical and cultural diversity, exotic flora and fauna and plethora of activities. Srilanka offers in about sixty five thousand kilometers of area, eight UNESCO world heritage sites, unspoiled beaches, fifteen national parks with plentiful wildlife, botanical gardens, three hundred and fifty waterfalls, lakes and an ancient culture dating back to over two thousand and five hundred years.
Srilanka tourism lets one skim through diversity in all aspects of life. Starting with pristine beaches of various shapes to the central part of plains with geographic features such as lagoons, wetlands, rivers and different types of jungle, rich with varied wildlife and mist covered mountains. Hillsides of Srilanka are blanketed by undulating tea plantations and are marked by spectacular waterfalls.
Srilanka homes a multi-ethnic, multi religious and multi- cultural people who possess a warm and friendly nature. People of Srilanka are renowned for their hospitality. They would not even hesitate to invite strangers to their house for reception.
Srilanka Tour Operator will guide you to six UNESCO archaeological world heritage sites. They are holy city of Anuradhapura, primeval city of Polonnaruwa, Golden temple of Dambulla, ancient city of Sigiriya, sacred city of Kandy and old town of Galle and its fortifications. Kandy abodes the” Sacred temple of tooth” in which is kept the holy tooth relic of Buddha. Galle is enthralling with glimpses of Dutch colonial majesty, well preserved.
Srilanka is a land of unmatched biodiversity. The spirit of environmental conservation is engraved in the collective unconsciousness of Srilankan society with first Buddhist monarch of country establishing first wildlife sanctuary of world even before Christ. This tradition ensues with thirteen percent of area conserved as national parks, reserves and sanctuaries. The Sinharaja Forest Reserve is designated as UNESCO world heritage site.
The variety Srilanka Wildlife found in jungles of Srilanka is a wonder for its size. From times immemorial elephants and peacocks from the Sri Lankan jungles were valuable exports to kingdoms worldwide. But Srilankan jungles are not only noted for its fauna. A journey into Srilankan jungles will lead you to a world where nature retains its primordial charm.
The major National Parks of Srilanka are Yala National Park, Wilpattu National Park, Gal Oya National Park, Uda Walawe National Park, Madhura Oya National Park, Wasgamuwa National Park, Horton Plains Nationa Park and Bundala National Park. The animals seen in National Parks of Srilanka include elephant, leopard, sloth bear, sambhur, deer and monkeys, wild buffalo, wild boar, porcupine, ant-eater, civet cat, jackal, mongoose, loris and several varieties of lizards, squirrels, reptiles and amphibians. Out of these loris is unique to Srilanka.
With a long coastline to boot, Srilanka is apt for wind-surfing, water skiing, surfing, sailing, scuba- diving, snorkeling and speed boating. More renowned of water sports sites are Negombo, Wadduwa, Kalutara, Beruwela, Bentota, Hikkaduwa and Galle.
Many types of rice, spices, vegetables and fruits are cultivated in Srilanka. This fact mixed with foreign influences result in a unique and delicious cuisine. Srilanka has a delectable array of snacks also.
Ayurvedic treatment is now a specialty of Srilanka. The system consists of various modes of herbal treatments, baths and massages. Yoga, meditation and special diets are also included.

The Beaches of Sri Lanka are mesmerizing. The beaches offers a wide range of water activities like swimming, parasailing, windsurfing, white water rafting, sea diving and jet skiing. The sun kissed beaches of the due drop country are worth visiting. The cool breeze, the swaying palm trees, the cerise sunsets and the cold water of the Indian Ocean soothes your mind, body and soul. Lie on the sand for a perfect tan drinking a chilled Mojito with on other sound to be heard than the splashing of the waves. Some of the well known beaches of the island country are the Negombo, Mount Lavinia, Galle, Hikkaduwa, Beruwala and Benota.

The tropical paradise of Srilanka is separated with the subcontinent of India by a small water body known as the Palk Strip. The lush rolling hills of Tea Gardens are of major attractions and tourists from near and far come to view these gardens from paradise. We normally drink a cup of tea but to really appreciate a cup of tea you must take in mind the effort, time, dedication and passion goes to blending that blend of tea. The manufacturing process of tea is no less than that of wine fermented from the grapes. Srilanka with its perfect weather conditions is the third largest producer of tea. Some of the tea producing regions of the dew drop paradise is the Galle, Kandy, Nuwara Eliya and Dambulla. The tea garden of Srilanka is a great holiday destination and visiting it will be a phenomenal experience.

[url=]Travel to Srilanka[/url] and let the temples spell bound you with their eloquent charm. The Gangaramaya Buddhist Temple which was built in the nineteenth century is located in the middle of a turquoise Beira Lake, creates a peaceful atmosphere. The walls of the temples are arrayed with magnificent statues of the Reclining Buddha, portray and painted stories towards the journey of enlightened. The outer parts of the temple are lined with numerous miniature statues of meditating Buddha and are really inspiring works of art.
Come to the island country and take home a bag full of memories and experiences which you can later reflect and smile upon.

Today this destination is a prominent tourist hot spot of the world.
Sri Lanka was once a lonely planet that has no live but except it glows of its nature beauty and charm. Today it is one of the best tropical islands in the subcontinents of India and tourism is quite active and vibrantly happening nowadays. The Islands of Buddhism, Hinduism, Island and Christianity have resulted in many temples, mosques and churches that give fascinating attraction to tourist worldwide.
Sri Lanka has number of charming cities with significant attractions that offers a myriad of opportunity to the tourist worldwide. Each city has uniqueness of its own and possesses incredible lure and tempting attractions. Among the tourist Places to visit in Sri Lanka, Colombo and Anuradhapura are the top leading tourist targeted cities of this destination.
Colombo
It is the capital city of Sri Lanka and the largest city known in its region with main port center, one of the best sites for tourist to land. It is commercial and financial center of Sri Lanka with an attraction blend with old and new. Colombo is an ideal stop place and a favorable start place for tourist. There are many historical and wonderful places to see. The forts, Pettah, Galle face green, Slave Island, Mount Lavinia, Kelaniya Raj Maha Vishara, Dehiwala Zoo, National Museum, Viharamahadevi Park along with Wolvendaal church and Himdu temples are attractions of tourist in this place.
Anuradhapura ancient city
This city serves as the first capital city of Sri Lanka and is said to be model of city planning which is now known to be a sacred city with many historical marvels. This city is located at a distance of about 206 km from Colombo and is an archaeologist’s delight and contains several monuments of historical importance. Here the popular dagoba tree which is the holy Bo-tree is quite amazing and impressive.
Sri Lanka possess many outstanding amazing sites and so it is often known tourist mesmerizing paradise with ancient and glorious nature of water.

Kashmir a Very Delightful Place to Visit

Kashmir is a very beautiful place famous for its excellent natural beauty and heavenly ambiance. It is a very delightful place where the tourists can find nature always at its best. It is also known as “paradise on earth” and invites thousands and thousands of tourists from across the world. This charming land is blessed with lush green valleys, rolling hills, gushing rivers, plunging waterfalls, blue lakes, gushing streams and lots more. Kashmir is blessed with pleasant and moderate climate and the tourists can visit this place at any time of the year, in summer it offers the tourists with excellent scenic natural beauty and during the tourists can see the pristine snow fall which really makes this charming country a heavenly land.

Kashmir the most beautiful place on earth offers the tourists with real beauty of nature which will surely mesmerize the tourists and the visitors. Kashmir tours is very interesting as it fill the tourists with joy and happiness, it offers them with peace and tranquility which is very much soothing and relaxing for those tourists who wants to escape from the hustle and bustle of the city life. It is a very pure and pristine land where the Hindu pundits and the Buddhist lamas meditate and rejuvenate themselves. It also provides the tourists with mighty mountains and beautiful Mughal gardens which is amazing with a many varieties of flowers with different colors. The scenic beauty here is mesmerizing which will compel the tourists to visit this heavenly land again and again. It is also a suitable and idle place for the honeymooners as it provides the couples with beautiful ambiance and the most romantic houseboat cruise.

Ladakh is a very pristine and a beautiful destination in Kashmir which is visited by numerous tourists from across the world. It is such a beautiful and delightful place that it fills the tourists with surprise and leaves them speechless. This beautiful land is surrounded by the some of the highest mountain ranges of the world. Ladakh Tour Package are available from Kashmir and from anywhere in India. It offers the tourists with all the facilities needed by them during the tour; it caters to all the needs and requirements of the visitors so they can enjoy their holiday in a very special and memorable way. These tour packages are tailor made and planned according to the budget of the tourists. These packages are also responsible for providing the tourists with comfortable accommodation and best service facilities.

Tour to Vaisnodevi is a dream of every Hindu as it is considered to be one of the most important and significant pilgrimage place for the Hindus. The nearest railway station and the airport are at Jammu at a distance of about 50kms from the base camp Katra. A number of taxis, tourists vans, and deluxe buses are available to these places. Visit to this shrine provides the tourists with peaceful and tranquility, it gives the tourists a feeling of presence of God and divinity. It is a very beautiful and religious shrine which invites numerous devotees from around the world.
